sys_script_include.name: lmxAjax

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_e20a1f1e47f071100230afb8036d43ba
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1066037_lms.lmxAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>lmxAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var lmxAjax = Class.create();
lmxAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getDateDiff : function(){
		var d1 = new GlideDate();
		d1.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_start'));

		var d2 = new GlideDate();
		d2.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_end'));		
		
		var duration = GlideDate.subtract(d1,d2);
		return duration.getNumericValue();
	},

    type: 'lmxAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-24 06:44:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>e20a1f1e47f071100230afb8036d43ba</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>lmxAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_1066037_lms">2d1f9a46473031100230afb8036d431c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">2d1f9a46473031100230afb8036d431c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e20a1f1e47f071100230afb8036d43ba</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-24 07:25:45</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
